articles.title: Deloitte inks one million square feet of office lease in Bangalore - Economic Times
articles.description: Deloitte has secured three office spaces in Bengaluru, amounting to 1 million sq ft, as part of plans to boost its operations in the Indian city. The firm has signed deals to lease 500,000 sq ft of office space at Prestige Tech Park, and over 460,000 sq ft in…
articles.content: Deloitte, a Big Four firm, has inked deals with Prestige Group and Salarpuria to secure three office spaces spanning 1 million sq ft in a bid to bolster its operations in Bengaluru.The firm has lease… [+1653 chars]
